pkgmetadata.longdescription: # NudeNet: lightweight Nudity detection```bashpip install --upgrade nudenet``````pythonfrom nudenet import NudeDetectornude_detector = NudeDetector()nude_detector.detect('image.jpg') # Returns list of detections``````pythondetection_example = [ {'class': 'BELLY_EXPOSED', 'score': 0.799403190612793, 'box': [64, 182, 49, 51]}, {'class': 'FACE_FEMALE', 'score': 0.7881264686584473, 'box': [82, 66, 36, 43]}, ]``````pythonall_labels = [ "FEMALE_GENITALIA_COVERED", "FACE_FEMALE", "BUTTOCKS_EXPOSED", "FEMALE_BREAST_EXPOSED", "FEMALE_GENITALIA_EXPOSED", "MALE_BREAST_EXPOSED", "ANUS_EXPOSED", "FEET_EXPOSED", "BELLY_COVERED", "FEET_COVERED", "ARMPITS_COVERED", "ARMPITS_EXPOSED", "FACE_MALE", "BELLY_EXPOSED", "MALE_GENITALIA_EXPOSED", "ANUS_COVERED", "FEMALE_BREAST_COVERED", "BUTTOCKS_COVERED",]```
